p.li: At J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy, our mission is to help our esteemed clients achieve their best health in an environment that is understanding, compassionate, and supportive.
Our team of dedicated practitioners is experienced and dedicated to offering the most advanced and comprehensive solutions to all your health needs outside of an emergency.
We help our patients understand their unique symptoms and form a lasting partnership with them to eliminate the underlying cause of disease using safe, effective, and tailored treatment plans.

block2.h2: Initial Interview – Video or In Office

p.li: We will go over your medical or family history, lifestyle, current medications (if there’s any), detailed symptom and, a food journal. Our nutritional consultation is the first essential step to closing the gap by getting to know more about you and whether we can help improve your well-being.

In the interview, We also try to identify the dietary disconnect that may be present in your lifestyle and how to address it. We can make out the necessary and actionable steps you can take to improve and optimize your health. Every patient is unique and thus requires a different approach to holistic wellness.
